content.text:
# Twelve Hotels & Residences at Third Ward

TWELVE Hotels & Residences at Third Ward- [http://www.twelvehotels.com Twelve Hotels & Residences] was a proposed 39 story skyscraper in Charlotte, North Carolina, US. If built, it would have been located at the intersection of South Mint and West 2nd Streets.
See also
*List of tallest buildings in Charlotte
